DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective of this study is to measure and compare the acute effects of rupatadine 10 mg, relative to placebo and hydroxyzine 50 mg as an active control on healthy volunteersâ€™ performance on a standard over-the-road driving test and a car-following test.
DOC.brief_title: Comparative Effects of Rupatadine 10 mg, Hydroxyzine 50 mg and Placebo on Actual Driving Performance
DOC.detailed_description: The study shall be conducted according to a three-way, double-blind, placebo and active controlled crossover design. Treatment groups are identified as follows. - Rupatadine - Hydroxyzine - Placebo
DOC.criteria: 1. Normal healthy males or females 2. Subjects must be experienced drivers. 3. Vision: normal binocular acuity, corrected, or uncorrected. 1. Pregnant or nursing females.
